item.title:
RT by @conduitxyz: Conduit powers some of the industry's most impactful infrastructure. Congrats on the launch of the Conduit Hub!
We love working with @conduitxyz to showcase developer preview features like Ethereum's upcoming EIP7702 on @Ithacaxyz Odyssey!
item.dc:creator: @gakonst
item.description:
Conduit powers some of the industry's most impactful infrastructure. Congrats on the launch of the Conduit Hub!

We love working with @conduitxyz to showcase developer preview features like Ethereum's upcoming EIP7702 on @Ithacaxyz Odyssey!

nitter.freedit.eu/conduitxyz/status/1881779806205034894#m

item.title: R to @conduitxyz: You can also read our full Conduit Hub introduction blog here. https://www.conduit.xyz/blog/conduit-hub-rollup-nodes/
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description: You can also read our full Conduit Hub introduction blog here. conduit.xyz/blog/conduit-hub…

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: We’re only as successful as the rollups we power. Conduit Hub is our way of making it as easy as possible for developers to build great apps on our customers’ chains, and for users to start exploring them.
See the Hub for yourself here. https://hub.conduit.xyz/
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
We’re only as successful as the rollups we power. Conduit Hub is our way of making it as easy as possible for developers to build great apps on our customers’ chains, and for users to start exploring them.

See the Hub for yourself here. hub.conduit.xyz/

item.title: R to @conduitxyz: Conduit Hub isn’t just for builders though. Users can add the chain to their wallet, bridge funds over, and see what’s happening on the block explorer too.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description: Conduit Hub isn’t just for builders though. Users can add the chain to their wallet, bridge funds over, and see what’s happening on the block explorer too.

item.title: R to @conduitxyz: Want to run your own node? That’s easy too. Click the Run a node button and we’ll give you the configuration files, P2P configuration, and RPC URL you need, plus links to helpful docs.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description: Want to run your own node? That’s easy too. Click the Run a node button and we’ll give you the configuration files, P2P configuration, and RPC URL you need, plus links to helpful docs.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Want to start building on Mode? Click the API key button to access Conduit Nodes – the built-in RPCs we run on all Conduit rollups.
Sign up, follow the step-by-step process, and start sending requests to Mode’s RPC endpoint.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Want to start building on Mode? Click the API key button to access Conduit Nodes – the built-in RPCs we run on all Conduit rollups.

Sign up, follow the step-by-step process, and start sending requests to Mode’s RPC endpoint.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Click one you want to learn more about to reach its Conduit Hub profile. Let’s look at @modenetwork as an example.
You get links to its public RPC endpoint, Websocket URL, block explorer, and bridge. Plus a built-in tx tracer, and links to its rollup configuration files.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Click one you want to learn more about to reach its Conduit Hub profile. Let’s look at @modenetwork as an example.

You get links to its public RPC endpoint, Websocket URL, block explorer, and bridge. Plus a built-in tx tracer, and links to its rollup configuration files.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Join us for a quick tour.
On the Conduit Hub homepage, you’ll see a grid of all Conduit rollups that have chosen to publish their info.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Join us for a quick tour.

On the Conduit Hub homepage, you’ll see a grid of all Conduit rollups that have chosen to publish their info.

item.title:
Conduit Hub is our rollup directory, with:
API keys for RPCs on Conduit chains Config files to run a node Smart contract addresses & more
It's everything you need to build on chains like @modenetwork, @GravityChain, @build_on_bob, @PhalaNetwork, @use_corn, & @ithacaxyz Odyssey
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Conduit Hub is our rollup directory, with:

API keys for RPCs on Conduit chains
Config files to run a node
Smart contract addresses & more

It's everything you need to build on chains like @modenetwork, @GravityChain, @build_on_bob, @PhalaNetwork, @use_corn, & @ithacaxyz Odyssey

item.title: R to @conduitxyz: There’s more inside, including a nuts and bolts breakdown of all components of RaaS tooling, use cases, and more evaluation tips. Read it here https://www.conduit.xyz/blog/rollups-as-a-service-raas-guide/
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description: There’s more inside, including a nuts and bolts breakdown of all components of RaaS tooling, use cases, and more evaluation tips. Read it here conduit.xyz/blog/rollups-as-…

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Total cost of operations (TCO):
Two RaaS solutions may cost the same, but if one consistently innovates, pushes scaling boundaries, is always first to integrate new tools, etc. then it will save much more on TCO – your true business costs – in the long run.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Total cost of operations (TCO):

Two RaaS solutions may cost the same, but if one consistently innovates, pushes scaling boundaries, is always first to integrate new tools, etc. then it will save much more on TCO – your true business costs – in the long run.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Partnership:
As the nexus point of your chain’s infra, your RaaS needs to be a true business partner, not a transactional one.
The RaaS should function like an extension of your team: In the trenches with you, solving problems, advising on key decisions, and helping you scale.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Partnership:

As the nexus point of your chain’s infra, your RaaS needs to be a true business partner, not a transactional one.

The RaaS should function like an extension of your team: In the trenches with you, solving problems, advising on key decisions, and helping you scale.

item.title:
We just published a guide to rollups-as-a-service platforms and recommend anyone considering building an L2 take a look.
Lots inside, but two points of RaaS evaluation stand out:
1) Partnership
2) Total cost of operations
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
We just published a guide to rollups-as-a-service platforms and recommend anyone considering building an L2 take a look.

2) Total cost of operations

item.title:
The G7 Testnet from @G7_DAO is now public!
The private testnet created incredible momentum and we expect even more game developers to deploy during this public phase.
Mainnet launch 🔜
2025 is the year of onchain gaming
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
